definition: section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: He refused to accept the money.
A large sum has been allocated for buying new books for the library.
sentences.chinese: 已經劃撥一大筆款子給圖書館購買新書。

sentences.english: The treasurer ran off with all the club's funds.
sentences.chinese: 司庫攜俱樂部的全部款子潛逃。

sentences.english: They decided to raise the money by subscription.
sentences.chinese: 他們決定靠募捐的辦法來籌集這筆款子。

sentences.english: Every sum of money received must be booked down immediately.
sentences.chinese: 每筆收進的款子都必須立即登記。

sentences.english: Ten thousand dollars is quite a large sum.
sentences.chinese: 一萬美金是相當大的一筆款子。

sentences.english: And yet he had set aside a goodly sum to be hers absolutely.
sentences.chinese: 但是他已經提出很大一筆款子來作爲絕對是她的了。

sentences.english: The money was donated by a local businessman who wishes to remain anonymous .
sentences.chinese: 這筆款子是當地一位不願透露姓名的企業家捐贈的。

sentences.english: Numerous small contributions soon bulk up into a considerable sum.
sentences.chinese: 許多小額捐助不久就積成了一筆可觀的款子。

sentences.english: To raise funds, he had to run many places, even as far as Beijing and Nanjing.
sentences.chinese: 他東補西湊地爲立達籌着款子，還要跑北京，跑南京。

sentences.english: Remittance was made through a bank.
sentences.chinese: 款子是通過銀行匯寄的。

sentences.english: Now, how much do you think we can get back on our loans?
sentences.chinese: 我們放出去的款子，估量是還可以收回幾成呢？

sentences.english: He refused to take the money.
That sum has brought the total up to￡400 exactly.
sentences.chinese: 那筆款子已使總數達到整整400英鎊。

definition: money farm (dealing in illegal foreign currency of money laundering)
to have a cash flow problem
to borrow money for a short time
government repository/state provincial warehouse (esp. during Qing dynasty)
to get an advance on one's pay
